tool.name: subgroup.r
tool.command:
Rscript '$__tool_directory__/subgroup.r'
#if $str( $input_file ): --input_file '${input_file}' #end if
#if $str( $format ): --format '${format}' #end if
#if $str( $threads ): --threads '${threads}' #end if
${normalize}
#if $str( $threshold ): --threshold '${threshold}' #end if
#if $str( $categories ): --categories '${categories}' #end if
#if $str( $output_file ): --output_file '${output_file}' #end if
${verbose}
#if $str( $log_level ): --log_level '${log_level}' #end if

param.name: categories
param.label: Categories
param.help: A list of category names (e.g., A B C)

tool.help:
usage: subgroup.r [-h] [--input_file INPUT_FILE] [--format {csv,tsv,json}] [--threads THREADS] [--normalize] [--threshold THRESHOLD] [--categories CATEGORIES [CATEGORIES ...]] [--output_file OUTPUT_FILE] [--verbose] [--log_level {DEBUG,INFO,WARNING,ERROR}]
test
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --input_file INPUT_FILE Path to input file --format {csv,tsv,json} Format of input file (default: csv) --threads THREADS Number of threads to use (default: 4) --normalize Enable data normalization --threshold THRESHOLD Threshold value for filtering (default: 0.5) --categories CATEGORIES [CATEGORIES ...] A list of category names (e.g., A B C) --output_file OUTPUT_FILE Path to output file --verbose Enable verbose mode --log_level {DEBUG,INFO,WARNING,ERROR} Set logging level (default: INFO)
